strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Dark Mechanicus and Chaos Navy formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Iron Warriors Traitor Legion, which mirrors the loyalist Iron Hands and Imperial Fists in their use of siege weaponry. They abhor daemons, and may not summon these, but adore bionics and forbidden weaponry.

formations.name: Iron Warriors Retinue
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Warpsmith, six Chaos Space Marines
extraUnits: Replace two Chaos Space Marines with two Havocs: 25 points

formations.name: Iron Warriors Armoured Company
extraUnits: Replace six Chaos Vindicators with six Chaos Predators (25 points), three Chaos Spartan Assault Panzers (75 points), or six Chaos Land Raiders (125 points)

formations.name: Havocs
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Warpsmith, four Havocs, Chaos Spartan Assault Panzer
extraUnits: Replace the Chaos Spartan Assault Panzer with two Chaos Land Raiders: 25 points

sections.name: Iron Warriors Elite Formations
sections.description: One Elite formation may be taken per Core formation.

formations.name: Chosen
extraUnits: Replace two Chaos Rhinos with two Chaos Siege Rhinos (10 points), or two Chaos Dreadnoughts or two Chaos Siege Dreadnoughts (75 points)

formations.name: Bezashk Destroyers
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Warpsmith, four Bezashk Destroyers

formations.name: Tyrant Terminators
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Warpsmith, four Tyrant Siege Terminators

sections.name: Iron Warriors Siege Formations
sections.description: One Siege formation may be taken per Core formation.

formations.name: Iron Warriors Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Add one Iron Warriors Basilisk: 75 points

formations.name: Heavy Siege Panzers
formations.units: Two Chaos Typhon Heavy Siege Panzers
extraUnits: Add one Chaos Typhon Heavy Siege Panzer: 125 points

sections.name: Dark Mechanicus and Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

upgrades.title: Iron Warriors Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Battleship
items.description: Replace the Devastation Class Cruiser with a Despoiler Class Battleship

options.description: Replace an Iron Warriors Warpsmith with an Iron Warriors Warsmith
Replace an Iron Warriors Warpsmith and its unit with a Daemon Prince

items.name: Transport
items.description: Add transports to the formation, up to the number required to transport all infantry units in the formation

options.description: Add up to three Chaos Rhinos
Add up to three Chaos Siege Rhinos
Add up to three Chaos Land Raiders
Add up to two Chaos Spartan Assault Panzers

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Chaos Dreadnoughts, or up to two Siege Dreadnoughts

items.name: Dreadclaws
items.description: Transport a formation containing only infantry units and Dreadnoughts in Dreadclaws (formation must be deployed on a spacecraft)

items.name: Vindicators
items.description: Add up to two Chaos Vindicators
